== Alanallur-I (627603) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Alanallur-I is a village in the [[Mannarkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 1405 hectares and harbouring 3670 households with total population of 18332 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Perinthalmanna]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 8843 and female population is 9489. Scheduled Caste Population is 1779 and Scheduled Tribes population is 45. Census Location Code of the village is 627603<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate male population: 7310 (82.66%)
* Literate female population: 7526 (79.31%)
